channel.title: Am I missing something? Forum Signatures question
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Am I missing something? Forum Signatures question"

item.title: Re: Am I missing something? Forum Signatures question
item.content:encoded: Several people have also reported that their sig is not changing at dayroll. McM is looking into it.

item.title: Re: Am I missing something? Forum Signatures question
item.content:encoded: I noticed the same thing. Turns out the html for the sig was changed, so the old one is static as of its last update. Try checking your home page and recopy your html - that might fix it.

item.title: Re: Am I missing something? Forum Signatures question
item.content:encoded: It updates at dayroll. If it is not updating every dayroll then who knows why it is happening.

item.title: Am I missing something? Forum Signatures question
item.content:encoded: For some reason, the forum signature image I am provided with, for referral links, never seems to update. It shows my stats and location from about two weeks ago. Does it only change every so often, or is there something i need to do to update it?
